title: Bug 116609 - Regression: Color orange doesn't work
description: Bug 116609 - Regression: Color orange doesn't work. Description: When setting the color to orange, it doesn't work as expected.
OB: The color orange does not display correctly when set in the report item.
EB: The report item should display the color orange when it is set.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Insert a report item. 2. Set the color or background color to orange. 3. Check if the color is correctly displayed.
